removeSensivity: cmd window size reset;cmd window density reset
javaLangHeadtrick: cmd appops set com.dts.freefireth ACTIVATE_FOCUS_MODE allow;cmd appops set com.dts.freefiremax ACTIVATE_FOCUS_MODE allow;settings put global disable_gl_renderer 1
head: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=1.7:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8;device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=1.7:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
